#### 1.CellMarker

http://biocc.hrbmu.edu.cn/CellMarker
可以搜索，也可以很方便的下载。

![](https://upload-images.jianshu.io/upload_images/9475888-eae206d85f2a3528.png?imageMogr2/auto-orient/strip%7CimageView2/2/w/1240)

supp/Human_cell_marker.txt
supp/Mouse_cell_marker.txt

```{r}
library(dplyr)
cm = data.table::fread("../supp/Human_cell_markers.txt",data.table = F) %>% 
  select(cellMarker,cellName,cancerType,geneSymbol,everything())
head(cm)
```

#### 2.PanglaoDB

https://panglaodb.se/

![](https://upload-images.jianshu.io/upload_images/9475888-038b5ad70beb72fd.png?imageMogr2/auto-orient/strip%7CimageView2/2/w/1240)
![](https://upload-images.jianshu.io/upload_images/9475888-53a73fdee79bc10b.png?imageMogr2/auto-orient/strip%7CimageView2/2/w/1240)

这样就可以下载全部的数据。
supp/PanglaoDB_markers_27_Mar_2020.tsv.gz
我是2023.5.21下载的，这个数据好久没更新过。

```{r}
pl = data.table::fread("../supp/PanglaoDB_markers_27_Mar_2020.tsv.gz",data.table = F)
head(pl)
```


#### 3.GSEA C8
https://www.gsea-msigdb.org/gsea/msigdb/human/genesets.jsp?collection=C8

这个可以不下载。用msigdbr即可。

```{r}
library(msigdbr)
c8 <- msigdbr(species = "Homo sapiens",
                 category = "C8")
c8[1:4,1:4]
length(unique(c8$gs_name))
```
